Tutorials
=========
All of our tutorials are interactive Jupyter Notbeooks. Clone our `repository <https://github.com/mindaffect/pymindaffectBCI/tree/open_source>`_ to run them locally from your *pymindaffectBCI/mindaffectBCI* directory::
	
	jupyter notebook first_run.ipynb


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   
   first_run
